name: Hillstone Finance
introduce: Hillstone Finance is a smart contract-based asset liquidity project launched by Hillstone Partners—a private equity firm with more than 20 years of history in Korea. With the help of digital asset based on blockchain technology, Hillstone Finance facilitates asset liquidation and allows access to high profit funds that were not accessible for everyone. Everyone can now use Hillstone Finance Token, a.k.a HSF, to invest in various funds, and also get protected from investment loss. With HSF, investors can also realize instant liquidation of their asset.
